questions.question_text: ‘Je divase Bhagwānnu darshan thayu te divasthī ja ________ to thaī rahyu chhe ane je jīv bhāve karīne māru darshan kare tathā māru vachan māne tenu paṇ kalyāṇ thaī jāy to māre kalyāṇno shyo sanshay chhe?
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: ‘Je divase Bhagwānnu darshan thayu te divasthī ja kalyāṇ to thaī rahyu chhe...

questions.question_text: Hu to ________ chhu ane je kāī sādhan karu chhu te to Bhagwānnī prasannatāne arthe karu chhu,’ em samaje tene Bhagwānno māhātmye sahit nishchay jāṇavo.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Hu to kṛutārth chhu ane je kāī sādhan karu chhu te to Bhagwānnī prasannatāne arthe karu chhu,’ em samaje tene Bhagwānno māhātmye sahit nishchay jāṇavo.”

questions.question_text: Atishay je ________ hoy teno je upar rājīpo thāy tenā game tevā malin sanskār hoy to nāsh pāme ane Moṭā Puruṣhno rājīpo thayo hoy to rānk hoy te rājā thāy ane game tevā bhūnḍā prārabdha hoy to rūḍā thāy ane game tevu tene māthe vighna āvanāru hoy te nāsh thaī jāy.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Atishay je Moṭā Puruṣh hoy teno je upar rājīpo thāy tenā game tevā malin sanskār hoy to nāsh pāme...

questions.question_text: Moṭā Puruṣhno rājīpo thayo hoy to ________ hoy te rājā thāy ane game tevā bhūnḍā prārabdha hoy to rūḍā thāy ane game tevu tene māthe vighna āvanāru hoy te nāsh thaī jāy.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Moṭā Puruṣhno rājīpo thayo hoy to rānk hoy te rājā thāy...

questions.question_text: Jene pratyakṣh pramāṇ draḍh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī ________ na rākhavī je, ‘Hu rakhe marīne bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!’
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: jene pratyakṣh pramāṇ draḍh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī bīk na rākhavī je, ‘Hu rakhe marīne bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!’

questions.question_text: Evī ________ manmā rākhavī nahī; kem je, je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme paṇ vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān rahevā de nahī.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Evī āshankā manmā rākhavī nahī; kem je, je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme paṇ vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān rahevā de nahī.

questions.question_text: Jene potānu kalyāṇ ichchhavu tene to ________ ne ________ ethī uparānt bīju kāī jagatmā sukhdāyī nathī.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Jene potānu kalyāṇ ichchhavu tene to Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sādhu ethī uparānt bīju kāī jagatmā sukhdāyī nathī.

questions.question_text: Amāro draḍh ________ rākhasho ne kahīe tem karasho to tamane mahākaṣhṭ koīk āvī paḍashe tethī athavā sāt dakālī jevu paḍashe te thakī rakṣhā karashu ane koī ūgaryāno āro na hoy evu kaṣhṭ āvī paḍashe toy paṇ rakṣhā karashu.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: ...amāro draḍh vishvās rākhasho ne kahīe tem karasho to tamane mahākaṣhṭ koīk āvī paḍashe tethī athavā sāt dakālī jevu paḍashe te thakī rakṣhā karashu ane koī ūgaryāno āro na hoy evu kaṣhṭ āvī paḍashe toy paṇ rakṣhā karashu.
